name: Cloud CLI
description: Learn to interact with cloud platforms through the command line. The CLI is essential for automation and scripting.

learning_steps.description: Choose and install the CLI for your preferred cloud platform:

learning_steps.title: Install the AWS CLI
learning_steps.description: Follow the official guide to install the AWS CLI on your system.

learning_steps.title: Install the Azure CLI
learning_steps.description: Follow the official guide to install the Azure CLI on your system.

learning_steps.title: Install the Google Cloud CLI
learning_steps.description: Follow the official guide to install the gcloud CLI on your system.
Run a simple command to verify your CLI is working correctly:
learning_steps.code:
# AWS
aws --version

# Azure
az --version

# GCP
gcloud --version

learning_steps.description: Set up your credentials to authenticate with your cloud provider:
learning_steps.code:
# AWS
aws configure

# Azure
az login

# GCP
gcloud auth login
